utterances: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there! I'm interested in finding a commercial property for sale in the downtown area. Can you help me with that?
Of course! What type of commercial property are you looking for?
I'm looking for a retail space that can be used as a boutique store. Do you have any listings that match that description?

Yes, we do have some listings that might be of interest to you. Can you provide me with some more details about what you're looking for? For example, what is your price range, and how much square footage do you need?
Sure, my price range is between $500,000 and $1 million, and I'm looking for a space that is around 1,000 to 1,500 square feet.

Great! We have a few listings that might be a good fit for you. One option is a [listing type|sale] located at [location|downtown] that is 1,200 square feet and priced at $750,000. It's currently set up as a clothing store, so it could be a great fit for your boutique. Would you like more information about this property?
Yes, I would like more information about that property. Can you tell me more about the location and the condition of the property?

Certainly! The property is located in a prime location in the heart of downtown, with high foot traffic and great visibility. The building is in excellent condition, with modern finishes and plenty of natural light. It also has a large storefront window that would be perfect for displaying your merchandise. Would you like to schedule a viewing of the property?
Yes, I would like to schedule a viewing of the property. When is it available for viewing?
I can schedule a viewing for you at your earliest convenience. When would you like to see the property?
I'm available to see the property this Friday at 2 PM. Can we schedule the viewing for that time?
I'm sorry, but that time is already booked. However, I can schedule a viewing for you on Friday at 3 PM. Would that work for you?
Yes, that works for me. Please schedule the viewing for Friday at 3 PM. Thank you!

Great! I have scheduled the viewing for Friday at 3 PM. I will send you an email with all the details, including the address and the name of the agent who will be showing you the property. If you have any other questions in the meantime, please don't hesitate to ask.
Thank you so much for your help! I appreciate it.
You're welcome! It was my pleasure to assist you. If you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with, just let me know. Goodbye!

Sure, I'm planning to open a small restaurant and I need a space that has a kitchen, dining area, and preferably some outdoor seating. I'm looking for a location in the downtown area with high foot traffic and good visibility. I would need the property to be at least 1200 square feet and I'm open to either renting or purchasing. Do you have any listings that might fit these criteria?

Yes, we have a few listings that might match your needs. One property that comes to mind is a [listing type|lease] located in [location|downtown]. It's a 1300 square foot space with a fully equipped kitchen, dining area, and an outdoor patio with seating for up to 20 people. The location sees high foot traffic and has great visibility from the street. The lease terms are negotiable so we can work with you to find a plan that fits your budget. Would you be interested in scheduling a viewing of this property or would you like to hear about some other options as well?
That sounds like a great option! I would definitely be interested in scheduling a viewing of that property. When is it available for viewing and what documents do I need to prepare?

Great! I'm glad to hear that. The property is available for viewing starting [viewing schedule|next Monday]. To prepare for the viewing, you'll need to bring a valid ID and a proof of income, such as a bank statement or a pay stub. This will help us determine if you meet the financial requirements to lease the property. Would you like me to schedule the viewing for you?

If you have any other questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to me at any time.
